name: Aiabyss
description:
Aiabyss is a Roguelite RPG created using AI technology and RPG Maker MV. The game is focused on looting and character building. One of the main characteristics of the game is randomly generated loot and map events.

╠╬╬Plot

Play as a trapped soul trying to escape a corrupted alternate dimension. You alone are not strong enough for this challenge. By conjuring the souls of past lives you might become powerful enough to escape and return to your rightful dimension.

╠╬╬FEATURES

╬ Original artwork curated using AI

╬ Original soundtrack generated with AI

╬ Small party turn based combat

╬ Rougelite gameplay

╠╬╬
